channel.title: BigUpRadio.com SHAKE DAT DONKEY Dancehall Mixtape Show
channel.description: BigUpRadio.com proudly presents an all new weekly dancehall mixtape show SHAKE dat DONKEY hosted by DJ Trasha da Bootyshaker from the U.K. DJ Trasha has a worldwide following and is well known to make the ladies dance and keep the crowd hyped with energy. Only the top of the top dancehall reggae makes it into the Bootyshaker studio. Ladies shake dat donkey and check out your favorite Toppa Toppa London selecta! Join us the last Saturday of every month as DJ Trasha interviews artists Damian Marley, TOK, Tanto Metro & Devonte, Lil Jon and many more in 2006. ONE LOVE

image.title: BigUpRadio.com SHAKE DAT DONKEY Dancehall Mixtape Show

channel.itunes:summary: BigUpRadio.com proudly presents an all new weekly dancehall mixtape show SHAKE dat DONKEY hosted by DJ Trasha da Bootyshaker straight outta the U.K. Let me tell ya, he's on a serious mission to rock the house!
channel.itunes:subtitle: All new weekly dancehall mixtape show SHAKE dat DONKEY hosted by DJ Trasha

item.title: SHAKE Dat DONKEY #9 with Alozade, Farenheit & Blaxxx
item.description: The dancehall singer and producer ALOZADE guest stars on this months Shake Dat Donkey Dancehall Mixtape Show on Bigupradio.com. Other guests include the dancehall sensation FARENHEIT and reggae producer mogul BLAXXX From BLAXXX RECORDS. Don't miss these exclusive interviews with some of the hottest dancehall dons on the scene today!
item.itunes:author: bigupradio.com

item.title: SHAKE Dat DONKEY #8 with Beenie Man
item.description: The "King of the Dancehall" Beenie Man guest stars on this months Shake Dat Donkey Dancehall Mixtape Show on Bigupradio.com. DJ Trasha a.k.a."Tha Booty Shaker" chats it up with Beenie Man who is currently on a national US Tour. Find out about Beenie's new album, his tour and much more! Your UK toppa toppa DJ Trasha has a very special Beenie Man mix set that you will definitely not want to miss!

item.title: SHAKE Dat DONKEY #7 with Voicemail
item.description: BigUpRadio.com proudly presents an all new weekly dancehall mixtape show SHAKE dat DONKEY hosted by DJ Trasha da Bootyshaker straight outta the U.K. Longside the hottest dancehall riddims bumping in the clubs of Jamaica today and some new exclusive trax provided by London's jiggiest selecta DJ Trasha tha Booty Shaker. This week features interviews VOICEMAIL! Don't miss this show!

item.title: SHAKE Dat DONKEY #5 with I&I Sound & 360 Lady Sound
item.description: DJ Trasha hosts the SHAKE DAT DONKEY dancehall reggae mixtape show #5. Tha LA NY Heavy weight Sound System Sound Clash. From NYC 360 Lady Sound ( Greensleeves records), tha sexiest selectaz on tha planet. And from LA I and I Sound (Chocolate Bar) doin it live from their Ice Cream Truck on melrose.

item.title: SHAKE Dat DONKEY #4 with Sasha & Triniti
item.description: Yowzer yowzer, it's another mashing SHAKE DAT DONKEY Dancehall Mixtape Show with your host DJ Trasha "the Booty Shaker" on bigupradio.com. This week two very sexy and talented recording artists Sasha and Triniti stop by the show for interviews and special features. All the hottest riddims play non-stop on SHAKE DAT DONKEY. Tell a friend!

item.title: SHAKE dat DONKEY #3 Knotty Dread Sound & Jah Warrior Shelter
item.description: DJ Trasha Tha Booty Shaker brings in another phat SHAKE DAT DONKEY Dancehall Mixtape show. This week features an amazing Sound Clash between Jah Warrior Shelter Hi-Fi vs Jah Marvin Knotty Dread Sound! Also an exclusive Bigupradio interview with Jah Marvin. All the ladies don't miss an opportunity to shake your bootys. DJ Trasha is bringing the unstoppable sound directly to your home!

item.title: SHAKE dat DONKEY #1 with Damian Marley & TOK
item.description: BigUpRadio.com proudly presents an all new weekly dancehall mixtape show SHAKE dat DONKEY hosted by DJ Trasha da Bootyshaker straight outta the U.K. Let me tell ya he is on a serious mission to rock the house. DJ Trasha has a worldwide following and is well known to make the ladies dance and shake it. Only the top of the top makes it into the studio of the SHAKE dat DONKEY Show. This week special guests in include interviews with Damain Marley a.k.a Jr. Gong TOK and E-de. ONE LOVE
